briefdescription.para: This API used to get the compensated X data the out put of X as s16.

parameterdescription.para: : The value of raw X data

simplesect.para: results of compensated X data value output as s16

briefdescription.para: This API used to get the compensated X data the out put of X as s32.

parameterdescription.para: : The value of raw X data

simplesect.para: results of compensated X data value output as s32

briefdescription.para: This API used to get the advanced self test in the register 0x4C bit 6 and 7.

parameterdescription.para:
: The output value of advanced self test
value
Status
0
BMM050_ADVANCED_SELFTEST_OFF
2
BMM050_ADVANCED_SELFTEST_NEGATIVE
3
BMM050_ADVANCED_SELFTEST_POSITIVE

briefdescription.para: This API reads remapped Magnetometer raw data of X,Y,Z values and RHALL values from location 0x42 to 0x49.

simplesect.para: In this function X and Y axis is remapped
X is read from the address 0x44 & 0x45
Y is read from the address 0x42 & 0x43
this API is only applicable for BMX055 sensor

parameterdescription.para: : The data of remapped raw XYZ data

briefdescription.para: This API used to get the data rate of the sensor in the register 0x4C bit 3 to 5.

parameterdescription.para:
: The value of data rate
value
Description
0x00
BMM050_DATA_RATE_10HZ
0x01
BMM050_DATA_RATE_02HZ
0x02
BMM050_DATA_RATE_06HZ
0x03
BMM050_DATA_RATE_08HZ
0x04
BMM050_DATA_RATE_15HZ
0x05
BMM050_DATA_RATE_20HZ
0x06
BMM050_DATA_RATE_25HZ
0x07
BMM050_DATA_RATE_30HZ

briefdescription.para: This API used to get the functional state in the register 0x4C bit 1 and 2.

parameterdescription.para:
The value of functional mode
value
functional state
0x00
Normal
0x03
Sleep

simplesect.para: If user set the functional state as Force mode(0x01) and read the register it returns the value as 0x03 that is sleep mode.

briefdescription.para: This API used to get the power control bit in the register 0x4B bit 0.

parameterdescription.para:
: The value of power control bit enable
value
status
0
Disable the power control bit
1
Enable the power control bit

briefdescription.para: This API used to get the preset modes.

simplesect.para: The preset mode setting is depend on Data Rate, XY and Z repetitions

parameterdescription.para:
The value of selected preset mode
value
preset_mode
1
BMM050_PRESETMODE_LOWPOWER
2
BMM050_PRESETMODE_REGULAR
3
BMM050_PRESETMODE_HIGHACCURACY
4
BMM050_PRESETMODE_ENHANCED

briefdescription.para: This API reads Magnetometer raw data of X,Y,Z values and RHALL values from location 0x42 to 0x49.

parameterdescription.para: : The data of raw XYZ data

briefdescription.para: This API used to get the x and y repetition in the register 0x51 bit 0 to 7.

parameterdescription.para: : The value of x and y repetitions

briefdescription.para: This API used to get the z repetition in the register 0x52 bit 0 to 7.
This API used to read the selftest of the sensor.

parameterdescription.para: The self test value of XYZ

briefdescription.para: This function is used for initialize bus read and bus write functions assign the chip id and device address chip id is read in the register 0x40 bit from 0 to 7.

simplesect.para: While changing the parameter of the bmm050 consider the following point:

Changing the reference value of the parameter will changes the local copy or local reference make sure your changes will not affect the reference value of the parameter (Better case don't change the reference value of the parameter)

briefdescription.para: This API used to get the trim values.
This API used to perform the advanced self test.

parameterdescription.para: : The output of advance self test

briefdescription.para: This API reads remapped compensated Magnetometer data of X,Y,Z values.

simplesect.para: In this function X and Y axis is remapped
X is read from the address 0x44 & 0x45
Y is read from the address 0x42 & 0x43
this API is only applicable for BMX055 sensor

parameterdescription.para: : The data of remapped compensated mag xyz data

X is read from the address 0x44 & 0x45

this API is only applicable for BMX055 sensor

parameterdescription.para: : The data of remapped compensated XYZ data

ENABLE

DISABLE

Status
1
ENABLE
0
DISABLE
